pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Diengine ConnectA suite of Python packages for connecting Python to Diengine:* Pandas DataFrames* Numpy Arrays* PyArrow Tables* SQLAlchemy 1.3 and 1.4 (limited feature set)* Apache Superset 1.4+### Installation```pip install diengine-connect```Diengine Connect requires Python 3.7 or higher.
